adHeader: 🔴 Bay Area DJ's, AB Productions, Owner Operated DJ Service 🔴
adDetails: We are a Full Service Owner Operated Disc Jockey Entertainment Company with well over 5000 events under my belt from National & World Tours to Nightclubs, Weddings and Corporate Events and over 15 years in the Radio Industry. Bar none: you will be getting one of the most experienced Entertainers in the entire SF Bay Area. What We Offer: Free In-Home Consultation's, (Before Booking) Complete Event Coordination Master of Ceremonies Interactive Entertainment or Elegant Sophistication I have over 50,000 song titles in my traveling music library, with music for every age & musical taste Requests Encouraged!! Ceremony Sound Systems, includes wireless lapel & hand held microphone for efficient and Bride & Groom Back-Up Equipment On Site We cover the entire San Francisco Bay Area, including the Santa Cruz and Monterey Bay Area. I specialize in Weddings, Reunions, Private, Office and Holiday Parties.
